timeline.author: kennknowles
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@

+#    See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+#    limitations under the License.
+
+# https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/INFRA/.asf.yaml+features+for+git+repositories
+
+github:
+  description: "Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming"
+  homepage: https://beam.apache.org/
+  labels:
+    - python
+    - java
+    - big-data
+    - beam
+
+  enabled_merge_buttons:
+    squash: true
+    merge:  true
+    rebase: true
+
+notifications:

replies.bodyText: Yes they are good. The only outcome I don't like of this change by INFRA is that we have two places to configure mailing lists notifications because other mailing lists (e.g. issues@) get data from JIRA and not github and we cannot configure this with this file at the moment, but well maybe that will be done in the future.
replies.author: iemejia

replies.bodyText: @iemejia Do you know if there's a separate settings file somewhere for jira notifications?
replies.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText:
Nop the canonical reference so far it is the .asf.yaml file https://s.apache.org/asfyaml-notify
Maybe worth to create a JIRA to request this.
replies.author: iemejia

timeline.bodyText: Maybe worth to disable the other two since we follow the extra merge commit convention
timeline.author: iemejia
